alert.note: Alert for Washington (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 7:26AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Washington County through 800 AM EDT... At 726 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Salem, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southern Washington County, including the following locations... Shorts Corner, Martinsburg, South Boston, Livonia, Rosebud, Harristown, Hardinsburg, New Philadelphia, New Pekin and Becks Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
